CustomField.description: The VAT rate for this pricebook as a decimal (e.g., 0.25 for 25%, 0.23 for 23%). Used when sending invoices to Reepay/Frisbii.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the VAT rate as a decimal. Examples: 0.25 (Denmark 25%), 0.23 (Ireland 23%), 0 (no VAT)
CustomField.label: VAT Rate
